alert.note: Alert for Jewell; Mitchell; Osborne; Phillips; Rooks; Smith (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Blowing Dust Advisory issued April 12 at 6:21PM CDT until April 13 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...BLOWING DUST ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CDT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Visibility between one quarter mile and one mile in blowing dust. * WHERE...Portions of north central Kansas and central, east central and south central Nebraska. * WHEN...Until midnight CDT tonight. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to reduced visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blowing dust has been moving from southwest to northeast across the Hastings forecast area this afternoon with several reports of lowered visibility. Southwesterly winds ahead of a cold front are shifting to the northwest this evening. This will push the dust from northwest to southeast in areas behind the front this evening. Winds will continue to be very gusty behind the front as well. Be prepared for rapidly changing visibility due to blowing dust. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Motorists should not drive into an area of blowing dust. Remember, Pull Aside, Stay Alive.

area.areaDesc: Jewell; Mitchell; Osborne; Phillips; Rooks; Smith
